List all dairy products in alphabetical order:SELECT Products.ProductName FROM Products INNER JOIN Categories ON Products.CategoryID=4;:Join products to categories and use an ID:y

List all products by a New England Seafood Canary:SELECT DISTINCT Products.ProductName FROM Products INNER JOIN Suppliers ON Products.SupplierID=(SELECT SupplierID FROM Suppliers WHERE Suppliers.CompanyName LIKE "%New England Seafood Canner%");:join products to suppliers and use a nested query with LIKE:y
Tell me the total amount of orders for Chai:SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT OrderID) from "Order Details" INNER JOIN Products ON Products.ProductID=1;::y
